name: D'Crossier - Flor de D’Crossier No. 560 - Julietas
additionalNotes: According to Isaias Santana Diaz, founder of Pure Aroma Cigars, D'Crossier Flor de D'Crossier No. 560 was "inspired by the ideal of being true to oneself and asserting personal freedom to make inspired choices". The Flor D'Crossier lives up to this ideal. A medium-strength cigar, the Flor de D'Crossier No. 560 features a natural Ecuadorian wrapper with binder from the Dominican Republic, and filler tobaccos from Nicaragua and the Dominican Republic.
